DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect K201 sinus rhythm restoration , symptom score , various cardiovascular parameter , safety .
DOC.brief_title: Study K201 Injection Restoration Sinus Rhythm Subjects Who Are Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic atrial fibrillation Atrial fibrillation document ECG Adherence local clinical standard ACC/AHA/ESC practice guideline atrial fibrillation regard thromboembolic event prevention treatment . Systolic blood pressure < 100 mmHg Heart rate < 50 bpm Temperature > 38Â°C QT QTcB > 440 m QRS > 140 m Paced atrial ventricular rhythm ECG Serum potassium < 3.5 meq/L History receive another intravenous Class I Class III antiarrhythmic drug within 3 day randomization History amiodarone last 6 month . Clinical evidence acute coronary syndrome Acute pulmonary edema embolism Hyperthyroidism Acute pericarditis History fail electrical cardioversion time History torsades des pointes History familial long QT interval syndrome History ventricular tachycardia require drug device therapy History NYHA Heart Failure Class 3 4 .
